items.details: Reading ðŸ“š Reading Project â€“ Our Story Books! ðŸŽ¨ We have already started bringing our storybook ideas to life, and theyâ€™re looking amazing! Today is your final chance to put in your best effortâ€”make your mini books neat, bright, and fun to read. âœ¨ Add special touches like a colorful bookmark, string or ribbon for binding, or even a shiny cover to make your storybook stand out. Show off your creativityâ€”youâ€™re the authors and illustrators! Remember, your storybooks are due TOMORROW and will be graded, so make them colorful, fun, and eye-catching. ðŸ“–ðŸ’¡ These are the spelling words for this Friday allow faint goal trace bitter firm patient common force prefer ReadWorks Assignment 4 â€“ Fables I have assigned 7 fables for you to complete in ReadWorks. Please work on them over the next two weeks. Go to www.readworks.org/student Enter our class code YU6GQ2 Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it Take your time, do your best reading, and enjoy the stories. Math Well done on completing your first math test. The tests were marked today, and everyone received a score. I was impressed with your effort! No book homework! Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.
